content.title: Self-learning
content.description: Since 2020, Théo (DevJ2K) has pursued a continuous path of self-learning in software development. With over 140 repositories on GitHub, he has explored numerous technologies, frameworks, and domains through personal and experimental projects.

content.title: 42 Paris
content.description: Théo joined 42 Paris in September 2023 to pursue a Master's-level program in IT Architecture, with a specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Data. As part of the highly practical, peer-to-peer learning model, he has completed over 76 individual and team-based projects covering topics such as algorithms, systems programming, web development, and AI.
content.common-core-achievement: 5th fastest worldwide among more than 21,000 students across all 42 campuses

content.title: OpenClassrooms
content.description: Théo completed several courses on OpenClassrooms, including 'Learn to Code with Python' and 'Build a Website with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript'. These courses provided him with a solid foundation in programming and web development.

content.title: Harvard University
content.description: Théo acquired access to online courses from Harvard University, focusing on computer science and artificial intelligence. These resources were selected as part of his self-education plan.
